meanings.definition: A formal agreement between individuals or parties
meanings.sent1: The pact between friends was to always share their snacks.
meanings.sent2: The business partners signed a pact to work together on the project.
meanings.sent3: The pact to take turns walking the dog made them laugh.
meanings.sent4: Their pact to always support each other was like a shield against challenges.
meanings.sent5: The pact to meet at the park every Sunday was etched in their minds.

meanings.definition: A formal agreement between countries or groups
meanings.sent1: The peace pact between the two nations ended the conflict.
meanings.sent2: The trade pact allowed for easier exchange of goods between the countries.
meanings.sent3: The pact to share resources during emergencies was a smart move.
meanings.sent4: Their pact to fight against injustice was a beacon of hope.
meanings.sent5: The environmental pact aimed to protect the planet for future generations.
